summary.span: 提供用于连接到 WebSocket 服务的客户端。

span.span: Provides a client for connecting to WebSocket services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间中的某些类和类元素在 windows 7、Windows VISTA SP2 和 Windows Server 2008 上受支持。Some of the classes and class elements in the namespace are supported on Windows 7, Windows Vista SP2, and Windows Server 2008. 但是，Windows 8 和 Windows Server 2012 只支持客户端和服务器 Websocket 的公共实现。However, the only public implementations of client and server WebSockets are supported on Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012. 在 windows 7、Windows VISTA SP2 和 Windows Server 2008 上受支持的命名空间中的类元素是抽象类元素。The class elements in the namespace that are supported on Windows 7, Windows Vista SP2, and Windows Server 2008 are abstract class elements. 这样，应用程序开发人员便可以通过实际的客户端 Websocket 实现来继承和扩展这些抽象类类和类元素。This allows an application developer to inherit and extend these abstract class classes and class elements with an actual implementation of client WebSockets.

summary.span: 中止连接并取消任何挂起的 IO 操作。

span.span: Aborts the connection and cancels any pending IO operations.
The `ClientWebSocket` cannot be reused once it is aborted.

summary.span: 关闭作为异步操作的 实例。

span.span: Close the instance as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 在 实例关闭后，返回的对象将完成 。The returned object will complete after the instance is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task ConnectAsync (Uri uri, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task ConnectAsync(class System.Uri uri, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Function ConnectAsync (uri As Uri, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Task
public: System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ ConnectAsync(Uri ^ uri, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);
member this.ConnectAsync : Uri * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

param.name: uri
param.span: 要连接到的 WebSocket 服务器的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the WebSocket server to connect to.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 用于传播应取消操作的通知的取消标记。

span.span: A cancellation token used to propagate notification that the operation should be canceled.

summary.span: 连接到 WebSocket 服务器以作为异步操作。

span.span: Connect to a WebSocket server as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用远程网络目标启动 WebSocket 握手，然后协商子协议。The method initiates the WebSocket handshake with a remote network destination, and then negotiates the sub-protocol. 对于普通 WebSocket 连接，请 `ws://` 在 uri 中使用方案。For plain WebSocket connections, use the `ws://` scheme in the uri. 若要使用 TLS/SSL 的安全 WebSocket 连接，请使用 `wss://` 方案。For secure WebSocket connections over TLS/SSL, use the `wss://` scheme. 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 返回的 对象将在实例上的连接请求完成后完成 。The returned object will complete after the connect request on the instance has completed.

summary.span: 将 上的数据作为异步操作进行接收。

span.span: Receives data on as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此操作不会阻止。This operation will not block. 返回的 对象将在实例上的接收请求完成后完成 。The returned object will complete after the receive request on the instance has completed. 每个对象上只支持一个发送和一个接收 。Exactly one send and one receive is supported on each object in parallel.

span.span: The is not connected.
The has been closed.
